title: Adipose Cell Therapy
tagline: Cushion Joints with Your Own Healing Cells
description: Micro-fragmented fat injections that provide cushioning cells, anti-inflammatory factors, and long-lasting joint support.
longDescription: Adipose cell therapy uses a small sample of your own fat, processed in clinic to extract regenerative cells and cushioning matrix. Injected into painful joints, it reduces inflammation, improves lubrication, and protects cartilage for sustained relief. It’s ideal for patients who want a potent, natural alternative before considering surgery.

overview.title: Why Adipose Cells Work
overview.content: Adipose tissue is rich in mesenchymal stem cells, growth factors, and cushioning matrix. We harvest a small amount via mini-liposuction, process it in a closed system to preserve cell integrity, and reinject it into joints or tendons under ultrasound guidance. The cells modulate inflammation, improve lubrication, and stimulate repair for long-term relief.
highlights: Autologous: your own cells, zero rejection risk
Ideal for moderate to severe arthritis
Supports knees, hips, ankles, shoulders, and spine facet joints

faq.question: Does the harvest leave scars?
